title: Trainer
description: Responsible for training team members and new employees.
responsibilities: Create and implement training programs.
Assess the skills and needs of team members.
Provide ongoing support and feedback to trainees.

title: Group Leader
description: Leads and coordinates the team within the department.
responsibilities: Motivate and guide team members.
Set goals and ensure the team meets objectives.
Monitor team performance and provide feedback.

title: Senior Group Leader
description: Leads multiple teams and ensures high-level coordination across the department.
responsibilities: Manage multiple group leaders and ensure project alignment.
Develop strategies to improve team collaboration.
Monitor the overall department performance.

title: Teacher
description: Responsible for delivering knowledge and fostering learning.
responsibilities: Develop lesson plans and instructional materials.
Assess and evaluate student progress.
Provide guidance and mentorship to learners.

title: Checker
description: Ensures the accuracy and quality of the work produced.
responsibilities: Review completed tasks for errors or discrepancies.
Verify compliance with standards and guidelines.
Report and resolve quality issues.

title: Manager
description: Manages the daily operations and resources of the department.
responsibilities: Coordinate projects and assign tasks.
Ensure timely completion of department objectives.
Maintain a productive work environment.

title: Account
description: Handles financial records and transactions within the department.
responsibilities: Maintain accurate financial records.
Assist with budgeting and financial planning.
Ensure compliance with accounting standards.

title: Senior Account
description: Oversees financial operations and provides advanced accounting expertise.
responsibilities: Supervise junior accountants and review their work.
Prepare detailed financial reports for stakeholders.
Ensure adherence to advanced financial practices.

title: Controller
description: Responsible for managing the overall operations of the department.
responsibilities: Oversee departmental budgets and expenses.
Ensure compliance with financial regulations.
Prepare reports for senior management.

title: Senior Controller
description: Leads the department's operational control, focusing on high-level strategy.
responsibilities: Develop and implement advanced operational strategies.
Monitor and evaluate long-term departmental goals.
Advise senior leadership on performance improvements.

title: Telecaller
description: Engages with clients or customers via telephone for various purposes.
responsibilities: Handle inbound and outbound calls professionally.
Provide information or support to clients.
Maintain records of all interactions.

title: Consultant
description: Provides expert advice to optimize departmental performance.
responsibilities: Conduct audits and assessments.
Provide strategic business advice.
Help implement new technologies to improve efficiency.

title: Senior Consultant
description: Offers advanced guidance and leadership for strategic projects.
responsibilities: Lead complex assessments and provide insights.
Mentor junior consultants and manage consultancy teams.
Drive implementation of innovative solutions.

title: Lead Checker
description: Heads the quality assurance team and ensures exceptional standards.
responsibilities: Supervise the checking team and review their work.
Develop quality control guidelines.
Ensure consistency across all quality assurance processes.

title: Audit
description: Examines financial and operational records for compliance and accuracy.
responsibilities: Conduct detailed reviews of financial documents.
Identify discrepancies and areas of risk.
Prepare audit reports with actionable recommendations.

title: Support
description: Provides assistance to ensure the smooth functioning of operations.
responsibilities: Assist team members with tasks and troubleshooting.
Maintain operational tools and resources.
Ensure timely resolution of issues.
